channel.title: Make Shops
channel.description: How do you add NPCs to where you want, and have them able to sell stuff you want them to be able to sell.

item.title: Make Shops
item.dc:creator: @scootkid scootkid
item.description:
@scootkid wrote:

well that takes quite a bit i’ll give you the general idea
in shops.cfg there are your shops
example-

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--
shop = 10	@whi@Trimmed @blu@Shop!!			1	1	7332	100	7334	100	7336	100	7338	100	7340	100	7342	100	7344	100	7346	100	7348	100	7350	100	7352	100	7354	100	7356	100	7358	100	7360	100	2583	100	2585	100	2587	100	2589	100	2599	100	2601	100	2603	100	2605	100	2623	100	2625	100	2627	100	2629	100	3472	100	3474	100	3477	100	7364	100	7368	100	7372	100	7376	100	7380	100	7384	100	7388	100	7392	100	7396	100

Then the npc
First you need to add a “wanneshop = _” in client.java
Pick whatever npc you want and put into the code
Example-

} else if (NPCID == NPC ID) { PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = SHOP #; }

Then the last thing is you have to open your autospawn.cfg
I Suggest putting the npc id near the top because i had some prolems getting it to wanne the shop on my server…
Example-

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 559 2726 3370 0 0 0 0 0 0 Legend's Shop

If You Have Any Questions Just Tell Me
YW!

Read full topic
